ansible_deployment.Deployment¶

class ansible_deployment.Deployment(path, config)¶

Represents an ansible deployment.

Parameters

  • path (str) – Path to deployment directory.

  • config (DeploymentConfig) – Namedtuple containing deployment config. It needs to have the following attributes. ‘roles’ is list of role names. ‘roles_src’ is a dict containing git info. ‘inventory_plugin’ is the name of the used inventory plugin.

deployment_dir¶

Deployment directory object.

Type

DeploymentDirectory

name¶

Deployment name.

Type

str

config¶

Namedtuple containing deployment config.

Type

DeploymentConfig

roles¶

List of Role objects associated with deployment.

Type

list

inventory¶

Inventory object representing deployment inventory.

Type

Inventory

playbook¶

Playbook object representing deployment playbook.

Type

Playbok

initialize_deployment_directory()¶

Initializes the deployment directory.

Initialization consists of

deployment_dir object initialization, roles object initialization, deployment_dir update of roles, playbook and inventory, deployment_dir git update with new files.

load()¶

Initializes deployment object from config file.

Parameters

config_file (path) – Path to config file.

Returns

initialized deployment object.

Return type

Deployment

run(tags=None)¶

Run deployment with ansible-playbook.

Parameters

tags (sequence) – an optional sequence of playbook tags.

Every deployment run triggers a new git commit in self.deployment_dir.repo containing the executed command.

save()¶

Write config as json to self.deployment_dir.config_file.

ssh(host)¶

Run ssh to connect to a given deployment host as ansible_user.

Parameters

host (str) – Target host.

update()¶

Update self.deploymentr_directory.
